wordcram
Interface WordColorer

public interface WordColorer

A WordColorer tells WordCram what color to render a word in.

Note: if you implement your own WordColorer, you should be familiar with how Processing represents colors -- or just make sure it uses Processing's color method.

Some useful implementations are available in Colorers.

Method Summary
 int colorFor(Word word)
          What color should this Word be?
 

Method Detail

colorFor

int colorFor(Word word)
What color should this Word be?

Parameters:
word - the word to pick the color for
Returns:
the color for the word
